oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hadley Park Towers, c.1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Hadley Park Towers (Project Tenn. 5-19), located on John A. Merritt Boulevard. Construction began on the 100-unit high-rise building in 1968, as a public housing project for the elderly. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
